great_forum.name: Great Forum
great_forum.description: A magnificent forum that fosters intellectual debate and civic engagement, significantly increasing the research speed of all alliance members.

grand_arsenal.name: Grand Arsenal
grand_arsenal.description: An enormous armory that provides the best weapons and armor, boosting the attack and defense of all alliance members' units.

the_great_market.name: The Great Market
the_great_market.description: A bustling hub of commerce that makes trade more efficient, increasing the market capacity and speed for all alliance members.

shrine_of_the_ancestors.name: Shrine of the Ancestors
shrine_of_the_ancestors.description: A sacred shrine that inspires great loyalty, boosting city happiness and population growth across all alliance members' cities.

fortress_of_the_gods.name: Fortress of the Gods
fortress_of_the_gods.description: An impenetrable citadel that provides powerful defensive bonuses to all cities on the island held by the alliance.
